name: Blood Harvest (itch) (Efilheim, Siieg, Pete Frogs)
description:
Your enemies are prepared, but they don't know that their blood can be harvested.

As a vampire, you'll have to use your ingenuity and your sword to infiltrate an underground military complex, while keeping an eye on your appetite for blood.

Changelog:
1.1: Bugfixes, ennemies not spawning when you don't get spotted, add a restart key. 

Controls:

Keyboard:
Arrows: Move
Space: Jump
S: Slash
D: Harvest

Xbox Controller:
Stick/Arrows: Move
A: Jump
X: Slash
Y: Harvest

Escape: Restart current level

Credits:

Pixel Artist: https://siieg.itch.io/
Sound Designer and Composer: https://pete-frogs.itch.io/
Developper: https://efilheim.itch.io/

Made during the Ludum Dare 52.
